# BIS198 Course Website
This website was generated using the [Reproducible Research Website Template](https://github.com/gchure/reproducible_website) by
[`@gchure`](https://github.com/gchure)
It is a heavily modified form of the Jekyll template
[Flexible Jekyll](https://artemsheludko.github.io/flexible-jekyll/) by
[`@artemsheludko`](https://github.com/artemsheludko). It is originally published
under the [GNU General Public License
v3.0](https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.en.html) and is distributed here
under the same license terms.
